amendment.description: To prohibit the issuance of transportation security cards to individuals who have been convicted of certain crimes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5007 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5007 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 4970. (consideration: CR S9604-9605; text: CR S9604-9605) To prohibit the issuance of transportation security cards to individuals who have been convicted of certain crimes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5007 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 4970.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5007 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
